Chapter 2 from online book called [Python For Data Science](https://aeturrell.github.io/python4DS/welcome.html)

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from palmerpenguins import load_penguins
# from plotnine import *
from lets_plot import *

LetsPlot.setup_html()
```

```{python}
penguins = load_penguins()
penguins
```

```{python}
penguins.head()
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    data = penguins,
    mapping = aes(x = "flipper_length_mm", y = "body_mass_g", color = "species")
)
 + geom_point()
 + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    data = penguins,
    mapping = aes(x = "flipper_length_mm", y = "body_mass_g")
)
 + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = "species", shape = "species"))
 + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
 + labs(
     title = "Body mass and flipper length",
     subtitle = "Dimensions for Adelie, Chinstrap, and Gentoo Penguins",
     x = "Flipper length (mm)",
     y = "Body mass (g)",
     color = "Species",
     shape = "Species",
 )
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "species")
)
 + geom_bar()
)
```

```{python}
penguins["species"] = penguins["species"].astype("category")
penguins.head()
```

```{python}
penguins.info()
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "body_mass_g")
)
 + geom_histogram(binwidth = 200)
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "body_mass_g")
)
 + geom_density()
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "species", y = "body_mass_g")
)
 + geom_boxplot()
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "body_mass_g", color = "species")
)
 + geom_density(size = 2)
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "body_mass_g", color = "species", fill = "species")
)
 + geom_density(alpha = 0.5)
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "island", fill = "species")
)
 + geom_bar()
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "island", fill = "species")
)
 + geom_bar(position = "fill")
)
```

```{python}
(ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "flipper_length_mm", y = "body_mass_g")
)
 + geom_point(aes(color = "species", shape = "island"))
)
```

```{python}
plotted_data = (ggplot(
    penguins,
    aes(x = "flipper_length_mm", y = "body_mass_g")
)
 + geom_point(aes(color = "species", shape = "island"))
 + facet_wrap(facets = "island")
)
ggsave(plotted_data, filename = "penguin-plot.svg")
```
